title: Victim advocates for inmate's mental health care at J. Reuben Long Detention Center
description: The victim of an inmate housed at J. Reuben Long Detention Center reached out to ABC 15 for help claiming the inmate isn't getting the medical care they need.th
content:
CONWAY, S.C. (WPDE) The victim of an inmate housed at J. Reuben Long Detention Center reached out to ABC 15 for help, claiming the inmate isn't getting the medical care they need.
